title: Finding Help for Headaches and Migraine
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

sections.heading: Find a Neurologist
content: Neurologists primarily treat migraine and will diagnose you based on both a neurological and physical exam.
Find a Neurologist

content_blocks.text: Neurologists primarily treat migraine and will diagnose you based on both a neurological and physical exam.
Find a Neurologist

sections.heading: Find a Doctor to Treat Migraines
content: Use this directory to find detailed listings of doctors in your area who specialize in treating migraine headaches.
Find a Doctor

content_blocks.text: Use this directory to find detailed listings of doctors in your area who specialize in treating migraine headaches.
Find a Doctor

sections.heading: Find a Doctor Who Treats Headaches
content: Other specialists treat migraine headaches that accompany the migraine condition as well as other pain-related problems.
Doctors Who Treat Pain

content_blocks.text: Other specialists treat migraine headaches that accompany the migraine condition as well as other pain-related problems.
Doctors Who Treat Pain

sections.heading: Find an Orthopedic Specialist
content: Orthopedic specialists and surgeons treat injuries and diseases that affect your musculoskeletal system and may cause you pain.
Orthopedic Specialists and Surgeons
